short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click (emphasis on the "CLICK", not just CHECK) all checkboxes on a page, firing any click events that may be attached to them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will *click* (not just check) all the checkboxes on the current page. This is important for firing click events that are attached to the checkboxes and may work for you when other "check all checkboxes" extensions have failed. If not, sorry.
